source:
TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_00<tab>Haermaga would explain the rules and regulations of the contest in which you are about to engage.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_00<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.<var 1A 01 /var>

Haermaga est impatient de vous voir relever le défi de R'Fhul Tia.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_01<tab>Haermaga thanks you for accepting the offer to help teach the overzealous R'fhul Tia an important lesson. He then lays down the rules: the first one to accumulate four Faire vouchers will be declared the victor. Faire vouchers can be won by successfully completing any of three events: the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, which will yield four vouchers, or the Iron Culinarian Challenge and Angling Extravaganza, which will yield one apiece. He further explains that you can take on any event as many times as you wish. With your objective clearly in mind, you set out to put on a clear demonstration of your adventuring abilities.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_01<tab>Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Haermaga vous a rappelé comment obtenir les quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var> nécessaires pour relever le défi que vous a lancé R'Fhul Tia<var 1D /var>: participer avec succès aux attractions des Feux de la Mort que sont “Pas dans l'tas”, le concours de cuisine ou la compétition de pêche. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à vous y mettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_02<tab>Your finely honed skills allow you to make short work of the challenges of the faire, and you swiftly accumulate the four vouchers required. You deliver them to Haermaga, who declares you the victor, and further explains his reasons for proposing this contest in the first place. After a short chat, he sends you out to look for R'fhul Tia, whose failure to return has the grand chaperone concerned.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var> et les avez remis à Haermaga, qui vous a déclaré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> vainqueur. L'organisateur en chef des Feux de la Mort vous a toutefois révélé être un peu inquiet au sujet de R'Fhul Tia et vous a demandé d'aller voir sa sœur R'Majha du côté du parcours de “Pas dans l'tas” pour savoir comment il se débrouille.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_03<tab>You find R'majha standing by herself on the beach. She explains that her brother is making an earnest attempt to succeed in the competition, but she is unaware of how many vouchers he has managed to procure. She mentions that she saw him talking to a particular personage standing a short ways away, and suggests that the two of you do the same in hopes of gleaning further information.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_03<tab>Lorsque vous vous êtes adressé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à R'Majha, celle-ci vous a expliqué que son frère était allé voir Beaufoin, le responsable de “Pas dans l'tas” plusieurs fois. Demandez-lui s'il sait comment s'en sort votre rival.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_04<tab>You speak with Beaudefoin, who observes that R'fhul Tia is just about to take on the Eorzean Ninja Warrior course. He offers to provide a rousing play-by-play for R'majha's benefit, then proceeds to do exactly that as R'fhul Tia soars to the start of the course with great promise...only to fall to an inglorious defeat with his very first jump. R'majha runs off, worried that her brother might be hurt, and you decide to go along to offer what aid and emotional support you may.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_04<tab>L'Élézen vêtu de jaune vous a appris que R'Fhul Tia était justement sur le point de se lancer dans l'attraction phare des Feux de la Mort. Hélas, malgré vos encouragements et ceux de R'Majha, celui-ci a fini par tomber et risque même de se noyer<var 1D /var>! Allez vite le secourir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_05<tab>You find R'fhul Tia shaken and stunned but physically no worse for the wear. While he is eager to rush back out and prove that his failure just now was an aberration, his young sister convinces him to get some much-needed rest before he takes on his next challenge. Mistakenly believing that he might yet win his competition with you, he grudgingly acquiesces to her request. Resolving to join them there, you begin thinking of how to break the news to the lad gently.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_05<tab>Grâce à vous, le jeune aventurier miqo'te a eu la vie sauve. Après vous avoir remercié d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à son aide, il a proposé que vous alliez ensemble faire une trêve à Costa del Sol. Rejoignez-le là-bas.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_06<tab>You find a well-rested and refreshed R'fhul Tia ready and raring to get back out there and prove himself the more capable adventurer. His enthusiasm is somewhat dampened, however, when you tactfully inform him that, in fact, you have already obtained the necessary four vouchers and claimed your victory. Initially reacting with utter disbelief, he soon comes to the understanding that he had vastly overestimated his own abilities. Confronted with indisputable evidence that he still has a long way to go before becoming a true adventurer, he resolves to follow your advice and example. Promising his dear sister that he will be more cautious and circumspect in the future, he thanks you for providing him with inspiration and a valuable life lesson, and strikes out in search of his next adventure. Your job here done, you decide to return to Haermaga to report on the events of the day.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_06<tab>R'Fhul Tia vous a demandé combien de <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var> vous aviez obtenu, et lorsqu'il a compris que vous aviez rempli votre part du défi, il a réalisé à quel point il avait été orgueilleux en croyant pouvoir rivaliser avec vous. Après que vous lui avez donné un conseil, il a décidé de repartir à l'aventure, mais avec un peu plus de sagesse qu'avant. En vous disant au revoir, il vous a demandé d'aller voir Haermaga pour le remercier de sa gentillesse à son égard et parce qu'il doit avoir une récompense pour vous.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_07<tab>Haermaga is heartened by your return, and the tidings that you bring to him. He thanks you once more for serving as a model─not only to R'fhul Tia but to all the aspiring adventurers who have seen you showcase your skills at the Moonfire Faire. He offers you a healthy reward for your efforts, and invites you to return as often as you wish while the festivities are still ongoing.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_SEQ_07<tab>L'organisateur en chef des Feux de la Mort s'est dit soulagé en écoutant votre récit des récents événements et vous a remercié de vous être occupé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de R'Fhul Tia. Il vous a également remis votre récompense et vous a demandé de continuer de participer aux attractions de la fête.

target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_TODO_00<tab>Donner <var 33 ((Item)) 03F26D590302 /var> à Haermaga

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_000<tab>Thank you, friend! Your presence will go a long way in teaching the lad that there's more to being an adventurer than gallivanting about making bold and baseless proclamations. Now, without any further ado, allow me to explain the ground rules.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_000<tab>Pour faire simple, considère que le défi que t'as lancé R'Fhul Tia est un moyen de lui apprendre les ficelles du métier.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>The name of the game here at the Moonfire Faire is collecting Faire vouchers. These can be acquired through displays of your adventuring prowess, and subsequently redeemed for a host of enticing rewards.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>Comme je te l'ai expliqué avant, tu peux obtenir <var 33 ((Item)) 02F26D590302 /var> en participant avec succès aux attractions des Feux de la Mort. Tu en auras quatre d'un coup en sortant victorieu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var> de “Pas dans l'tas”, ou un seul en réussissant le concours de cuisine ou la compétition de pêche.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>You can receive a whopping <var 1A 02 /var>four<var 1A 01 /var> vouchers for successfully demonstrating your high-flying acrobatic aptitude in the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. To participate, simply speak to the course registrar standing over by the shore.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>Pour t'inscrire, tu devras t'adresser à la personne qui est en charge de l'attraction qui t'intéresse.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_002<tab>If you're the type who'd rather keep your feet on the ground, you can also receive a single voucher each time you complete the Iron Culinarian Challenge or the Angling Extravaganza. You can take part in these by speaking to my colleagues Hildelana or J'nangho, respectively.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_002<tab>Libre à toi de te concentrer sur celles pour lesquelles tu es <var 08 E905 ((la plus douée)) ((le plus doué)) /var>. Mes collègues res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles de ces jeux te donneront davantage de précisions quant aux règles. Tu peux également t'adresser à Ascilia pour ça.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_003<tab>Should you have any other pressing questions about the festivities, Ethelia and her fellow Faire attendants would be happy to tell you more. Now, go out there and show us all─particularly a certain malapert Miqo'te─what you've got! I reckon four vouchers should be enough to put him in his place. Acquire them in whatever manner you prefer, then bring them back to me.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_003<tab>Lorsque tu auras obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var>, viens me les apporter, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>! Je te donnerai une récompense spéciale pour tes efforts.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>Enjoying the festivities, friend? Remember, once you've acquired four vouchers, come back and show them to me. Together, we'll show that cocksure lad that a true adventurer walks the walk without all the talk!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>N'oublie pas, lorsque tu auras obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var>, viens me les apporter, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>! Je te donnerai une récompense spéciale pour tes efforts.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>Oho! Back so soon? Let me guess...you've already acquired four vouchers for yourself?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>As-tu obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>One, two, three...and four!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>... Trois... Quatre<var 1D /var>! Le compte y est<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>And all without even breaking a sweat! R'fhul Tia has yet to return, so I do believe that I can officially declare you the winner of this competition.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>Ça ne m'étonne pas de toi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!
R'fhul Tia n'est toujours pas revenu me voir. Cela veut donc dire que tu as gagné votre défi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>...Not that the outcome was ever in much doubt, of course. Anyhow, your decisive triumph should go a long way toward giving R'fhul Tia some much-needed perspective. Speaking of which, did you happen to see the lad out there?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>Enfin, cela ne faisait aucun doute que tu serais le vainqueur... Je m'inquiète un peu de ne pas revoir R'fhul Tia, ceci dit.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>To tell the truth, I worry for the boy. When he first came to us a few years back, all starry-eyed and gushing about how he was going to be a great adventurer, I was happy for him. After all, what is the Moonfire Faire for, if not to encourage spirited young lads like him to join the ranks of those fighting for our realm?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>Il est tombé sous le charme des aventuriers en les voyant participer aux Feux de la Mort l'année dernière et a alors décidé de suivre la même voie. En tant qu'organisateur en chef, je suis très fier de ça.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>What's more, word has it that the lad lost his family. That one of the reasons he's so determined to follow this path is so he might protect his dear sister in his departed father's stead. That's why I'm all the more worried that he's in over his head.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>Et puis, pour tout te dire, c'est aussi pour lui un moyen pour être capable de protéger sa famille depuis que son père est mort. Je dis ça, mais je ne suis pas très au fait des us et coutumes miqo'tes...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>Mind you, we all know how it feels to get a touch overeager at our first taste of success. But this lad is taking this to an entirely unhealthy extreme. If he doesn't watch out, he's going to get himself killed out there.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>En tout cas, ces cir<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>ces font que je ne souhaite pas qu'il lui arrive du mal. Tu sais sûrement comme il est facile de se laisser emporter par son enthousiasme lorsqu'on connaît ses premiers succès dans notre métier.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>...That's why I had the idea to recruit you for this little competition. Just <var 1A 02 /var>maybe<var 1A 01 /var>, I thought, a small taste of failure at the hands of one of his more accomplished peers, would teach him─gently, mind you─that there was still much for him to learn.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>C'est pour ça que je t'ai demandé de le prendre sous ton aile. Perdre contre toi devrait le ramener à la réalité et lui remettre les pieds sur terre.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_018<tab>Speaking of which, could I bother you to look around and check in on the boy? Just to ensure that he hasn't gotten himself into any trouble, that is. I'd go myself, but I'd be causing trouble myself if I abandoned my post in the middle of the festivities!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_018<tab>Dis, tu ne voudrais pas aller voir comment il va<var 1D /var>? J'aimerais le faire moi-même, mais mes res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés m'en empêchent.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_019<tab>Last I heard, R'fhul Tia had a mind to take on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course and win himself four vouchers in one fell swoop. Perhaps you could find him or his little sister over by the shore?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_019<tab>Je crois bien que sa sœur R'Majha l'encourage du côté de l'attraction “Pas dans l'tas”. Je suis sûr qu'elle pourra te dire s'il va bien. Je compte sur toi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>Last I heard, R'fhul Tia was talking about taking on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. Would you be so kind as to go and check on the lad? Just to see that he hasn't gotten himself into any trouble and all...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>S'il te plaît, va voir R'majha du côté de l'attraction “Pas dans l'tas” et demande-lui si son frère va bien. Désolé de t'imposer ça, mais je compte sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_030<tab>Oh, hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Are you looking for Fhul?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_030<tab>Vous cherchez mon frrrère<var 1D /var>? Il est encore sur le parcours de “Pas dans l'tas”, là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_031<tab>Hmmm... I don't know how many slips of paper he has, but I do know that he's trying really, really hard!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_031<tab>Est-ce qu'il va bien<var 1D /var>? Hmm... Il fait de son mieux, mais je ne saurais pas vous dire combien <var 33 ((Item)) 09F26D590302 /var> il a obtenus jusqu'à prrrésent. Désolée.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_032<tab>I just saw him over there by the spraying water, talking to that man in the colorful clothes. Maybe he can tell you more about how Fhul is doing. I know! Why don't we go talk to him together?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_032<tab>Je l'ai vu aller auprès de ce monsieur, là-bas, ceci dit. Il pourra peut-êtrrre vous en dire plus<var 1D /var>! Euh... Si je me souviens bien... son nom est... Beaudefoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_033<tab>Sorry to trouble you, friend, but you're doing great service by taking your time to be a role model for the lad. The guild needs more adventurers like you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_033<tab>Désolé de t'imposer ça, mais je compte sur toi pour soutenir R'Fhul Tia<var 1D /var>! Merci d'avance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040<tab>And a very happy Moonfire Faire to you, little girl! I trust that you're enjoying the festivities?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040<tab>Hé, saluuut<var 1D /var>!! J'espère que vous vous éclatez bien aux Feux de la Mort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_041<tab>Hello, mister! Do you know where my brother went? His name is R'fhul Tia, and he's a great adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_041<tab>En fait, nous sommes ici pour prendre des nouvelles de mon grrrand-frère<var 1D /var>! Il s'appelle R'Fhul Tia et...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_042<tab>R'what...? Can't say the name rings any─ Ah! You must be talking about that cocksure Miqo'te lad who just dropped by a short while ago!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_042<tab>R'Fhul...<var 1D /var>? Aaah<var 1D /var>! C'est ce jeune Miqo'te qui est venu me voir plusieurs fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_043<tab>Why, if I'm not mistaken, I do believe that's him right over there. Yes, he's just about to take on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_043<tab>Je crois bien qu'il est sur le point de se lancer à “Pas dans l'tas”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_044<tab>This is most exciting, don't you think? Ah─I've an idea! Why don't I give you a play-by-play of your brother's daring attempt at the course? That way, you can experience every death-defying leap as if you were right there with him! All right, here goes nothing!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_044<tab>Très bien<var 1D /var>! Je vais vous commenter sa performance avec autant de passion qu'il va faire preuve de courage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_045<tab>Here we have our brave young challenger, R'fhul Tia! Look at the fire burning in his eyes as he readies himself for the challenge before him! Yes, the boy lacks not for confidence or determination, but will that be enough to carry him to victory today?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_045<tab>Et voilà R'fhul Tia<var 1D /var>! Il est en train de se préparer<var 1D /var>! On voit sur son visage que ce jeune homme est plein de fougue et de détermination<var 1D /var>!! Ah, là, là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_046<tab>And he's off and running! There's really no need to <var 1A 02 /var>run<var 1A 01 /var> into the water jet, but hey, whatever floats the lad's boat. He approaches the water, and...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_046<tab>Devant lui, le parcours impitoyable de “Pas dans l'tas”<var 1D /var>! Il se laisse porter par le courant d'air...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_047<tab>There he goes! Look at him shoot up, high, high into the sky! He flies through the air, and...!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_047<tab>Et c'est partiiiii<var 1D /var>! Arrivera-t-il à passer la première étape<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_048<tab>...Yes, he's landed! With remarkable balance and poise given his relative youth and inexperience, he stands safely on the starting platform, with the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course looming before him! Yes, now the true challenge begins!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_048<tab>Ouahou<var 1D /var>! Quelle maîtrise<var 1D /var>! Il y est arrivé<var 1D /var>! On sent bien toute l'agilité des Miqo'tes dans ses mouvements<var 1D /var>! Il fait preuve d'une sûreté et d'un sens de l'équilibre incomparables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_049<tab>The boy takes a few measured steps. He looks forward to the platform in front of him, and with a confident nod, he leaps, and...!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_049<tab>Il poursuit son avance avec des pas légers et adroits<var 1D /var>! Cette zone est certes facile, mais il suffit d'un instant d'inattention pour échouer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_050<tab>Gods be good! He's lost his balance on the landing! Has the Miqo'te lad's brave challenge come to a sudden, shocking end!?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_050<tab>Oh, là, là, là<var 1D /var>! Il vient juste de perdre l'équilibre<var 1D /var>! Est-il à l'envers là<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_051<tab>But no...no! He's still up there!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_051<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Ah, non<var 1D /var>! Il n'est pas tombé<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Ouf<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_052<tab>Yes, he's hanging on for dear life! What strength! What remarkable resilience!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_052<tab>Il se ressaisit comme il peut<var 1D /var>!! Courage, R'fhul Tia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_053<tab>Hah! A slight miscalculation on the angle, nothing more. I'll just pull myself...right up...and...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_053<tab>Faut pas crrroire que j'allais tomber à cet endroit-là<var 1D /var>! Je suis invinciiiible<var 1D /var>!!!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_054<tab>...Ah.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_054<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_055<tab>Oh, the ignominy! The agony of defeat! R'fhul Tia's challenge is over, but not for lack of effort! Give the boy a round of applause!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_055<tab>R'fhul Tia vient juste de tomber... Disqualifié<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_056<tab>Fhul! Fhul, are you okay!?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_056<tab>Ouaaah<var 1D /var>! Le pauvrrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_057<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We have to help Fhul!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_057<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous en prrrie<var 1D /var>! Il faut aller au secours de mon frère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_058<tab>I bet this man can tell us how Fhul is doing!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_058<tab>Cette personne sait peut-être ce qui est arrivé à mon frrrère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_059<tab>I had high hopes for the lad, but alas! It would seem he still needs a bit more seasoning. No shame in that, of course. We all have to start somewhere, after all!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_BEAUDEFOIN_000_059<tab>Quel dommage<var 1D /var>! Il était pourtant bien parti. On sent toutefois qu'il a encore du chemin à parcourir.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_060<tab><pant> <pant> Th...thank you, friend. Why...why do I feel like this isn't the first time this has happened?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_060<tab>Ugh... Uggh... Me-merrrci<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez sauvé la vie<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... C'est bizarre, j'ai l'impression d'avoir déjà vécu quelque chose de similaire<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab><pant> <pant> I Th...thank you, friend. I'm not sure what happened up there. One moment the platform was underneath my feet, and the next...it wasn't.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab>Ugh... Uggh... Me-merrrci<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez sauvé la vie<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... J'ai eu un moment d'inattention et j'ai glissé<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_062<tab>B-But <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, why are you here!? We are in the midst of a heated contest, after all! You should be out there collecting vouchers, not showing sympathy for your rival!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_062<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Attendez une minute<var 1D /var>! Mais pourrrquoi êtes-vous ici, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!? Notre petite compétition n'est pas encore terminée<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Rassurez-moi, ça n'est pas encore fini<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_063<tab>Oh, Fhul! Are you hurt? You should rest for a bit! Here, come with me!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_063<tab>Je suis si soulagée que tu ne sois pas blessé, Fhul Tia<var 1D /var>! Tiens, allons nous reposer parrr là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_064<tab>Rest? But I─ Ah, I suppose you're right. The contest can wait. After all, I don't expect <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here has more than a voucher or two at this point.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_064<tab>Hmm... Oui, tu as rrraison. C'est vrai que tu m'as encouragé tout du long, Petite-sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_065<tab>Speaking of which, why don't you come along? These faire games take quite a bit out of you─I imagine you're as exhausted as I am. Yes, I do believe there should be suitable place to rest just over thereabouts.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_065<tab>Dites, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous voulez bien faire une petite trrrêve<var 1D /var>? Je pense que nous pourrions faire une pause dans la cabane au nord-est<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_066<tab>Fhul! Fhul, are you okay!? Speak to me, Fhul!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_066<tab>Tu n'as rrrien, Fhul Tia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_070<tab>Ah, yes! I do believe all I needed was a little rest. Yes, just watch me! Now that I know precisely how that course works, I'm going to tear through it in record time! You'd best hurry back out there yourself, lest I get the jump on you in our little competition.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_070<tab>Aaaah<var 1D /var>! Je me sens tout rrrequinqué<var 1D /var>! J'ai eu un petit moment de faiblesse tout à l'heure, mais je n'ai pas dit mon dernier mot<var 1D /var>! Je n'abandonne pas si facilement, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_071<tab>Speaking of which, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...have you managed to get your first voucher yet? They certainly don't make it easy...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_071<tab>Au fait, vous avez combien <var 33 ((Item)) 09F26D590302 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Moi, je n'en ai toujours pas... Ne me dites pas que vous en avez déjà obtenu un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_QA1_000_001<tab>Actually, I have four.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_QA1_000_001<tab>J'en ai déjà obtenu quatre.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_QA1_000_002<tab>What do you think?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_QA1_000_002<tab>C'est un secret.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_072<tab>Bahahaha! That's a good one, my friend! As if any adventurer could acquire <var 1A 02 /var>four<var 1A 01 /var> whole vouchers in such a short...ah...er... You aren't serious...are you?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_072<tab>Hahaha<var 1D /var>! Quelle blague<var 1D /var>! Seul un être surrrhumain aurait déjà obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var><var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Euh... Attendez... Vous êtes sérieu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var>, là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_073<tab>Why, I...I'm not... Could you be saying that you already have <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var>? But that would be... Wait...three, even? Ah...er... I'm not sure I like where this is going... You don't seriously have all four?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_073<tab>Hahaha<var 1D /var>! Ne soyez pas si humble avec moi<var 1D /var>! Dites-moi donc combien vous en avez<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Euh... Attendez... Ne me dites pas que vous avez déjà tous <var 33 ((Item)) 03F26D590302 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_074<tab>But that's impossible! Inconceivable! How could anyone acquire four vouchers so fast!?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_074<tab>Mais... Mais c'est pas possible<var 1D /var>!!! Vous avez vrrraiment obtenu quatre <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26D590302 /var><var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>Wow, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You're really something! Isn't <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>, Fhul?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>Ouaaaah<var 1D /var>! Je suis im<var 16 /var>prrres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>née<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_076<tab>This can't be! I...I realize that I'm still new to this adventuring business, but never did I think there would be such a pronounced─and quite frankly, somewhat embarrassing─difference in skill between the two of us.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_076<tab>C'est incroyable<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Il y a une telle différence de compétence entrrre vous et moi<var 1D /var>!? J'ai du mal à l'imaginer<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_077<tab>But there is no arguing with the evidence before me. I am simply in awe of your prowess, friend. You are a role model to me and anyone who has ever aspired to be an adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_077<tab>J'a-j'avoue ma défaite<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes réellement au-dessus du lot<var 1D /var>! Voilà pourrrquoi j'ai autant d'admiration pour vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_078<tab>Why, to think I was so foolish as to think that I could compete with an honest-to-gods hero in earnest! Just thinking of it, I want to slap that brash and brazen boy in the face with a large harbor herring!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_078<tab>Flûte<var 1D /var>! J'ai vraiment envie de me frrrapper quand je pense à quel point j'ai été orgueilleux tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>! Comment ai-je pu croire que je vous arriverai ne serait-ce qu'à la cheville<var 1D /var>! Même à un jeu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_079<tab>But just you watch, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm going to train harder than ever before, and hone my skills over time, just the way you did. One day, when I truly have the talent to back up my words, will you accept my challenge once more?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_079<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je vais m'entraîner encore plus dur qu'avant<var 1D /var>! Oui, et un jourrr, lorsque je serai devenu un aventurier un peu plus mûr, je vous défierai encore<var 1D /var>! Vous voulez bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>Thank you, friend! You've given me all the inspiration I need today!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>Vous allez voir ce que vous allez voirrr<var 1D /var>! Je n'aurai aucun répit tant que je ne serai pas devenu très très fort<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Yes, it's high time I embarked on my next adventure! Why, I do believe I'll join my companions in investigating those curious rumors surrounding Tam-Tara Deepcroft!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Il n'y a pas de temps à perdre<var 1D /var>! Je vais reparrrtir de ce pas à l'aventure<var 1D /var>! Des amis m'ont invité à aller à un endroit appelé l'Hypogée de Tam-Tara<var 1D /var>! S'il y a des coccinelles là-bas, elles ont intérêt à bien se tenir, croyez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>Hm? What's this? Majha?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>Hmm<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... C'est toi qui m'appelles, Majha<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_083<tab>Hello, hello...Fhul?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_083<tab>... <var 1A 02 /var>Allô, allô, Grrrand frère<var 1D /var>?<var 1A 01 /var>

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab>Yes, it's me, Majha. Whatever is the matter? You gave your big brother a fright, just running off like that...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Allô, oui, c'est moi. Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, Majha<var 1D /var>?<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_085<tab>I'll be a good girl and stay out of trouble, so... Just promise me you'll take me to the faire again next year, okay?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_085<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Je vais t'attendrrre patiemment à la maison. Tu m'inviteras encore à la fête, d'accorrrd<var 1D /var>?<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_086<tab>And promise me you'll take care of yourself, and not go anywhere too dangerous. I know you're a great adventurer, but, please... I just want you to be safe...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_086<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ah, et fais bien attention. Ne prends pas de rrrisques inconsidérés. Tu as bien compris<var 1D /var>?<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_087<tab>Majha...
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_087<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Majha...<var 1A 01 /var>

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_088<tab>I promise, Majha. Your brother has learned an important lesson today. I'm going to follow in the footsteps of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here, and become an adventurer that you can truly be proud of.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_088<tab><var 1A 02 /var>C'est compris. On ira encore à la fête ensemble. N'hésite pas à m'appeler si jamais tu te sens trrriste.<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_089<tab>I'm already proud of you, Fhul. Hey, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do you have any advice for my brother? He really looks up to you, you know.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_089<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'aimerais que vous donniez un conseil à mon grand-frère<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_Q2_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_A2_000_001<tab>Take one step at a time.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_A2_000_001<tab>Il faut savoir prendre son temps et progresser petit à petit.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_A2_000_002<tab>Don't run headlong into a horde of monsters.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_A2_000_002<tab>Il ne faut pas foncer tête baissée dans les hordes de monstres.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_090<tab>I see, I see... Start small, and gradually gain confidence and experience through small victories. Try to do too much too soon, and you'll end up dangling by a thread from certain demise...like I was just before.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_090<tab>Je vois... Autrement dit, il faut avancer pas à pas et accumuler les petits succès et l'expérience à son rrrythme<var 1D /var>! Essayer d'aller trop vite est le meilleur moyen de faire une erreur et de tomber, comme moi sur le parcours de “Pas dans l'tas” tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_091<tab>I see, I see... No matter how confident you might be, approach potentially dangerous situations with care and caution, lest you end up overmatched and overwhelmed before you know it!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_091<tab>Je vois... Si je tombe sur une horde de monstrrres, je dois les affronter sans prendre de risques inutiles<var 1D /var>! Autrement dit, il ne faut pas présumer de ses forces, comme moi en vous défiant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_092<tab>Thank you ever so much, my friend! Why, I've learned so much from you today that I feel like I've already grown leaps and bounds. I can't wait to put my newfound knowledge to use in my adventures!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_092<tab>Merrrci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je vais graver ce précieux conseil dans ma mémoire et m'appliquer dans mes aventures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_093<tab>And with that, I do believe that Majha and I should be off. Pray give my regards to Master Haermaga, and assure him that I've taken today's lesson to heart.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_093<tab>Bien, je crrrois qu'il est temps que j'y aille<var 1D /var>! S'il vous plaît, allez remercier monsieur Haermaga pour toute sa gentillesse à mon égard<var 1D /var>! Il me semble qu'il a également préparé quelque chose pour le vainqueur de notre défi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_094<tab>Farewell, my friend. It has been an honor and a pleasure to do battle with you. Until the day we meet again, may you have the best of fortune in your adventures!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RFHULTIA_000_094<tab>Sur ce, au rrrevoir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je suis tellement fier d'avoir pu vous rencontrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_095<tab>Bye-bye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! See you again someday!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_095<tab>Je vous remerrrcie, moi aussi<var 1D /var>! Tchao<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_096<tab>Fhul had a short nap, and now he's ready to go!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_RMAJHA_000_096<tab>On dirait que mon frrrère s'est suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment reposé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_100<tab>Welcome back, friend! Did you manage to find R'fhul Tia? He hasn't gotten himself hurt, has he?
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_100<tab>Ah, te revoilà<var 1D /var>! Alors, comment allait notre aventurier débutant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>...You don't say. Well, it sounds as if he's learned his lesson. And given how much the lad looks up to you, I reckon it's a lesson he'll not soon forget.
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>Je vois. Il a encore pas mal de chemin à parcourir, autant mentalement que physiquement, mais je suis sûr qu'il n'oubliera pas la leçon qu'il a apprise grâce à toi, aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>Be proud, friend. Adventurers like you are an inspiration to one and all─not just the boy, but everyone who's seen your exploits here at the faire today!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>Je te remercie de t'être occupé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de lui, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Et puis, tu as aussi contribué aux Feux de la Mort.

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_103<tab>Ah, but before I forget! We had a special gift prepared for you to thank you for going above and beyond the call of duty. Here you go─I can't think of anyone who deserves it more!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_103<tab>Ah, avant que j'oublie<var 1D /var>! Voici ta récompense pour avoir relevé et gagné le défie de R'fhul Tia. Tu l'as bien méritée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>And with that, I should return to my duties. I leave you to enjoy the festivities. Remember, you are free to take on the challenges and showcase your skill as often as you like!
target: TEXT_FESSUM502_03664_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>Bon<var 1D /var>! Les Feux de la Mort sont loin d'être terminés<var 1D /var>! Je compte sur toi pour continuer d'y participer, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!
